meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by goiter.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with a goitrous condition.
meanings.sent2: Her neck appeared goitrous, causing concern among her friends.
meanings.sent3: The goitrous swelling made the man look like he had swallowed a balloon.
meanings.sent4: The goitrous growth on the tree trunk was a strange sight in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The goitrous appearance of the rock formation was a natural wonder.
